p: Methods: Administrated at 1000 Hz sampling rate the cardiac electric activity of 14 patients of the intensive care unit were analysed during their antibiotic therapy. The patients received a Unasyn®-infusion, which contains 1 g Sulbactam, 2 g Ampicillin and 230 mg sodium. Obtaining continuous ten-minute recordings (Lab SystemTh Pro - Bard electrophysiology U.S.A.) ten electrodes were fixed on the prepared skin for recording the leads I, II, III and V1 to V6 and reconstruct pursuant to Einthoven’s equation aVR, aVL, aVF.
